languages.text: "Кажется, пора разгерметизировать пару отсеков. В дисциплинарных целях".
"It seems that several of the ship's bays are due for depressurisation, as a disciplinary measure."
languages.original_text: "Кажется, пора разгерметизировать пару отсеков. В дисциплинарных целях".

traits.locale_text: "It seems that several of the ship's bays are due for depressurisation. As a disciplinary measure."
"It seems that several of the ship's bays are due for depressurisation. As a disciplinary measure."
"It seems that several of the ship's bays are due for depressurisation, as a disciplinary measure."
"It seems that several of the ship's bays are due for depressurisation, as a disciplinary measure."
"It seems that several of the ship's bays are due for depressurisation, as a disciplinary measure."
"It seems that several of the ship's bays are due for depressurisation, as a disciplinary measure."

languages.text: "Mir scheint, dass in einigen Buchten des Schiffs als disziplinarische Maßnahme der Druck abgelassen werden sollte."
languages.original_text: "It seems that several of the ship's bays are due for depressurisation, as a disciplinary measure."

traits.locale_text: "Mir scheint, dass in einigen Buchten des Schiffs als disziplinarische Maßnahme der Druck abgelassen werden sollte."

languages.text: « Apparemment, plusieurs compartiments doivent être dépressurisés en vertu de sanctions disciplinaires. »
languages.original_text: "It seems that several of the ship's bays are due for depressurisation, as a disciplinary measure."

traits.locale_text: « Apparemment, plusieurs compartiments doivent être dépressurisés en vertu de sanctions disciplinaires. »

languages.text: «Parece que algunos de los compartimentos de la nave van a ser despresurizados como medida disciplinaria».
languages.original_text: "It seems that several of the ship's bays are due for depressurisation, as a disciplinary measure."

traits.locale_text: «Parece que algunos de los compartimentos de la nave van a ser despresurizados como medida disciplinaria».

languages.text: 「懲戒処分として、船内の一部のベイが減圧されることになっているようだ」
languages.original_text: "It seems that several of the ship's bays are due for depressurisation, as a disciplinary measure."

traits.locale_text: 「懲戒処分として、船内の一部のベイが減圧されることになっているようだ」

languages.text: “在我看来，这艘船的几个船舱应该减压一下，让那些人尝尝惩罚的滋味。”
languages.original_text: "It seems that several of the ship's bays are due for depressurisation, as a disciplinary measure."

traits.locale_text: “在我看来，这艘船的几个船舱应该减压一下，让那些人尝尝惩罚的滋味。”

languages.text: "Geminin bazı bölmelerinde disiplin amacıyla basınç alma işlemi yapmak gerekiyor gibi duruyor."
languages.original_text: "It seems that several of the ship's bays are due for depressurisation, as a disciplinary measure."
